page.title: 14Mums's Diary.April 9th.1985
page.content: 8.15am. Woke up by Amy again. I looked out of the window, it was raining again. Amy and I went downstairs. Amy fed Daisy, our cat, and I made a cup of tea. 9.25am. I did my exercises, the first time for ages! Rebecca was already doing her conditioning for gym,so I watched her when I had finished. 9.50am. I had a shower, got dressed and went down for breakfast. Jim, Amy's dad, had made breakfast. We had Weetabix and toast. I then went back upstairs to finish getting ready. This got me out of the washing up! 10.30am. Did some washing and then put a chicken in the oven for lunch. 11.20am. Jim made me a cup of coffee and then I started home work for a typing exam I am taking soon. I'm not doing too well so Barbara, from next door, is going to help me tonight.
